channel.title: config on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in config on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Global site parameters On top of Hugo global configuration, the Relearn theme lets you define the following parameters in your config.toml (here, values are default). Note that some of these parameters are explained in details in other sections of this documentation. [params] # This controls whether submenus will be expanded (true), or collapsed (false) in the # menu; if no setting is given, the first menu level is set to false, all others to true; # this can be overridden in the pages frontmatter alwaysopen = true # Prefix URL to edit current page.
